attributes.action: Workpermit holder have legal rights to anywhere job if they have legal visa
attributes.additional_details: Because sometimes workpermit holder have no work their company and they survived with so many problems and if government approved this so they pay tax and can't do illegal work
attributes.background: Give workpermit holder rights to work anywhere with legal

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
